title: By the King, a proclamation for recalling and prohibiting seamen from the service of forreign princes and states
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the tenth day of January 1671/2, in the twenty third year of our reign."
Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
